text: On 11 December 2018 a terrorist attack happened in Strasbourg, France. Five people were shot dead and several others were injured. The suspect, a 29 years old man who was known to the security services and thought of as an extremist was wounded in an exchange of fire with a soldier, is at large. The incident occurred near Place Kléber, where Christkindelsmärik, a Christmas market, was being held. ==Related pages== * Charlie Hebdo shooting * 2024 Solingen stabbing * 2024 Magdeburg attack * November 2015 Paris attacks * April 2017 Champs-Élysées attack ==References== Category:2018 crimes in Europe Category:2018 mass shootings Category:2010s crimes in France Category:2010s mass shootings in Europe Category:2010s murders in Europe Category:December 2018 events category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Europe Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2010s Category:Mass murder in 2018 Category:Mass murder in Europe Category:Murders by firearm in France Category:Strasbourg Category:Terrorist incidents in 2018 Category:Terrorist incidents in Europe in the 2010s Category:Terrorist incidents in France Category:2018 in France
title: 2018 Strasbourg shooting
